Windows and Popups

  • .views
    • Get File Window
    • Crop My GIF Window
    • Progress Bar Window
    • Output Ready Popup
    • Error Popup

Note

Those are called in .controllers.App and .controllers.GifBrowser

UI Elements

  • .views._ui
    • Title Heading
    • File Frame
    • Crop Selection Frame
    • Crop Controls Frame
    • Gif Display
    • Progress Bar

Attention

views._ui functions should be called within .views

UI Controllers

  • .controllers._ui.Animation
  • .controllers._ui.Display

Caution

controllers._ui modules should be called within .controllers.App

GIF Controllers

  • .controllers._gif.Cropper
  • .controllers._gif.Frames

Warning

controllers._gif modules should be called within .controllers.App
